commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basd3848b8"

diff:
"d3848b8 Part of 191524 - 1) update tabbrowser to allow attach/detach of satchel controller from all browsers. 2) disclosure widget styles for privacy preferences panel
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index 68d80d4..db41c15 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -1069,6 +1069,22 @@
           ]]>
         </body>
       </method>
+      
+      <method name="attachFormFill">
+        <body><![CDATA[
+          var browsers = this.mPanelContainer.childNodes;
+          for (var i = 0; i < browsers.length; ++i)
+            browsers[i].attachFormFill();
+        ]]></body>
+      </method>
+
+      <method name="detachFormFill">
+        <body><![CDATA[
+          var browsers = this.mPanelContainer.childNodes;
+          for (var i = 0; i < browsers.length; ++i)
+            browsers[i].detachFormFill();
+        ]]></body>
+      </method>
 
       <property name="pageReport"
                 onget="return this.mCurrentBrowser.pageReport;"
"
